channel.title: R on Jacques Peeters's blog
channel.description: Recent content in R on Jacques Peeters's blog

item.title: Create your own blog with Blogdown
item.description: Intro This blog was created thanks to blogdown which is based on Hugo. Github allows you to host your personal static blog on it, find more in the links bellow. Useful Links https://github.com/rstudio/blogdown https://proquestionasker.github.io/blog/Making_Site https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/ https://hjdskes.github.io/blog/update-deploying-hugo-on-personal-gh-pages/
